Ability Learnset

By leveling up

Level Ability Cost Description
1 Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
10 Gluttony 56 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
25 Shield Dust 11 This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
40 Simple 78 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
55 Compound Eyes 62 The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.
70 Hive Mind 77 Normal-type moves become Bug-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
85 Symbiosis 11 The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
100 Lifelink 11 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
  • Bold indicates a default ability if multiple abilities are disabled
  • Italic indicates hidden ability if multiple abilities are disabled

By Disc

Disc Ability Cost Description
Disc 09 Swarm 14 Powers up Bug-type moves when the Pokémon's HP is low.
Disc 11 Ball Fetch 0 If the Pokémon is not holding an item, it will fetch the first failed thrown Poké Ball.
Disc 16 Lifelink 11 The Pokémon recovers some HP when it deals damage.
Disc 24 Frostproof 12 The Pokémon resists Ice-type moves and damage from frostbite.
Disc 40 Compound Eyes 62 The Pokémon's compound eyes boost its accuracy.

By tutoring

Ability Cost Description
Anticipation 1 The Pokémon can sense an opposing Pokémon's dangerous moves.
Cold-Blooded 32 Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in harsh sunlight.
Defeatist -17 Halves the Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stats when its HP becomes half or less.
Effect Spore 11 Contact with the Pokémon may inflict poison, sleep, or paralysis on its attacker.
Flower Fuzz 11 Boosts the Pokémon's Defensive stats on Floral Terrain.
Gluttony 56 Makes the Pokémon already eat a held Berry when its HP drops to half or less.
Harvest 32 May create another Berry after one is used.
Hive Mind 77 Normal-type moves become Bug-type moves. Their power is boosted a little.
Infiltrator 13 Passes through the opposing Pokémon's barrier, substitute, and the like and strikes.
Klutz -24 The Pokémon can't use any held items.
Poison Heal 79 Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned instead of losing HP.
Prankster 78 Gives priority to the Pokémon's status moves.
Predictable -15 This Pokémon's predictable maneuvers make moves hit against it without fail.
Run Away 0 Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
Shield Dust 11 This Pokémon's dust blocks the additional effects of attacks taken.
Simple 78 The stat changes the Pokémon receives are doubled.
Slow Start -94 For five turns, the Pokémon's Attack and Speed stats are halved.
Stall -13 The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
Symbiosis 11 The Pokémon passes its item to an ally that has used up an item.
Truant -67 The Pokémon can't use a move if it had used a move on the previous turn.
Weak Bones -1 Halves the Pokémon's Defense stat.
